title: Manage a Company Reorganization
description: A company is reorganizing two departments, which will result in changes to reporting structures.

tasks.description: Receive the new organizational chart from leadership.
Plan the bulk updates needed in the HRIS to reflect the new reporting structures.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP maps out all the required employee record changes.

tasks.description: Execute the bulk updates in the HRIS on the effective date of the reorganization.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP successfully updates all manager and department fields for the affected employees.
